update.description:
This pull request adds the perceptor class to the code base. The perceptor class is responsible for extracting perception information from the gamestate, transforming into the agent's local coordinate frame, and passing it to the server to be sent back to the agents. 

More information regarding perceptors can be found here: http://simspark.sourceforge.net/wiki/index.php/Perceptors
update.title: Perceptor Class

content.raw: if this is a constant, make it `const` and rename it to `kHeardDist`.
content.html: if this is a constant, make it const and rename it to kHeardDist.

content.raw: Could you rearrange the parameters and write them in the same order as they are described in the doxygen? The same applies to the rest of the methods.
content.html: Could you rearrange the parameters and write them in the same order as they are described in the doxygen? The same applies to the rest of the methods.

content.raw: Don't need the space between `> >` using C++11
content.html: Don't need the space between > > using C++11
